div.head: 朝食暮吐
div.div: eating at dawn vomiting at dusk

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: eating at dawn vomiting at dusk

sense.def: Illness Sign of a vomiting of undigested food in the evening that was consumed in the early morning. Jin gui yao lue 金匱要略 Mj: 脾傷則不磨，朝食暮吐，暮食朝吐，宿穀不化， 名曰胃反 , “When the spleen is harmed it cannot rub [the stomach]. Eating at dawn will result in vomiting at dusk . Eating at dusk will result in vomiting at dawn. Grains stay without being digested. This is called ‘stomach turnover’”.
